text: Sanchareswar Mahadev Temple is a temple of the lord Shiva in the Udaipur city in the state of Rajasthan, India. == General == Sanchareswar Mahadev is a Hindu temple of Shiva, situated in Umarda village near Udaipur. == References == Category:Hindu temples in Rajasthan Category:Shiva temples in Rajasthan Category:Mewar Category:Tourist attractions in Udaipur district
title: Sanchareswar Mahadev Temple
